title: Atkins: GOP reps, not Hillary Clinton, will be on hot seat at hearing
text:
Published By: Boston Herald - Today 
WASHINGTON — Tomorrow’s hearing of the House Select Committee on Benghazi will be a make-or-break event. But it’s not Hillary Clinton,...
